618770.name: RPG Maker VX Ace - Aztec Character Pack
618770.description:
From animal-blessed warriors to simple villagers, the Aztec myths and legends are filled with unique and memorable characters.

Bring the magic and mystery of the ancient age to your games with the Aztec character pack. Rooted in authentic history, we've added a touch of fantasy and intrigue to each of the 16 featured characters. Whether you're looking for main heroes or just another village to populate, Aztec Character Pack is a must-have!

Features:
  • 16 unique and authentic character designs, based on Aztec culture.
  • Matching character sprites, facesets and portrait busts.
  • Includes a variety of genders, ages and social standings.
618770.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 意大利语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 日语
